entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening and before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
